emailUpdated: E-mail update pending. Please check your inbox for a confirmation E-mail
forMoreInfoRtfm: For more info, read the documentation:
name: Name
pageNotFound: The page you are looking for is nowhere to be found.
signUpForAFreeAccount: Sign up for a free account
signup--text: This should not happen. Please help us out by creating an issue on GitHub
signup-invalid_input-text: Please enter a valid email address, and a password
signup-no_such_pending_confirmation-text: Sorry, but that is not a confirmation code we have on record? Perhaps it expired, in which case you can just sign up again.
signup-signup_pending-text: We already have a pending activation for this email address. We have sent you a fresh copy of the activation email in case you missed the original one.
signup-success-text: We've sent you an email at {email}.
signup-user_exists-text: We already have a user with that email address. Perhaps you'd like to login instead?
thisContentIsNotAvailableInLanguage: This content is not available in English.
thisPageIsNotIntendedForLoggedInUsers: This page is not intended for logged-in users
thisPageIsOnlyAvailableToFreesewingUsers: This page is only available to Freesewing users
txt-avatarDropzoneText: Drag and drop an image here, or click the button to pick one from your files.
txt-changeRequiresConfirmation: This change requires confirmation via E-mail
txt-clickEmailLink: Please click the link in the email to continue.
txt-consentProfile: Do you give your consent to process your profile data?
txt-consentProfileAnswerTiming: 12 months after your last login, or until you remove your account or revoke this consent.
txt-consentProfileAnswerWhatOptional: Optional: A profile picture, and social media accounts
txt-consentProfileAnswerWhy: To authenticate you, contact you when needed, and build a community.
txt-consentProfileQuestionShare: Do we share it with others?
txt-consentProfileQuestionTiming: How long do we keep it?
txt-contentLocaleFallback: That's why we're showing you the English version instead.
txt-contentNotTranslated: Unfortunately, this page has not (yet) been translated to {language}.
txt-didYouSpotATypo: Did you spot a typo? Do you feel something is missing, or needs clarification?
txt-editThisPageOnline: You can edit this page online and submit your changes.
txt-email-sharing: We'll never share your email with anyone else
txt-emailChangeConfirmationNotFound: Sorry, but we have no pending E-mail change for this confirmation code. Perhaps it expired, in which case you can simply make the change again in your settings.
txt-emailNotFound: If you can't find the email, check your spam folder, or contact us.
txt-gdprCompliant: Freesewing.org respects your privacy and your rights. We apply the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union (EU).
txt-modelsWithMissingMeasurements: These models lack some of the required measurements to draft this pattern:
txt-newModel: To get started, please give your model a name.
txt-password-policy: We don't enforce a password policy
txt-signup-step1: Enter your email address, and pick a password.
txt-signup-step3: Give us permission to process your personal data.
txt-slogan: An open source platform for made-to-measure sewing patterns
txt-withOrWithoutBreasts: Fitting breasts requires a bunch of extra measurements that are not relevant if you don't have breasts. If you indicate your model does not have breasts, we won't show you these measurements as they are irrelevant. If you're not sure what to pick, go for breasts.
txt-withOrWithoutBreasts-explainer: On other websites, this question may be phrased as 'male or female?'. Here, we don't like putting people in boxes. All we care about is fitting your chest.
weAreLoadingDataFromTheBackend: We are loading data from the backend
weAreValidatingYourConfirmationCode: We are validating your confirmation code
wouldYouLikeToLogOut: Would you like to log out?

aaron.title: Aaron A-Shirt
aaron.description: Aaron is an athletic shirt or tank top.

benjamin.title: Benjamin Bow Tie
benjamin.description: Benjamin is a bow tie pattern with four different shape options.

bent.title: Bent Body Block
bent.description: This two-part sleeve block is the basis of our coat and jacket patterns.

brian.title: Brian Body Block
brian.description: Brian is a basic body block for men.

bruce.title: Bruce Boxer Briefs
bruce.description: Bruce are comfortable yet stylish boxer briefs.

carlita.title: Carlita Coat
carlita.description: The womenswear version of our Carlton coat, aka Sherlock Holmes coat.

carlton.title: Carlton Coat
carlton.description: For Sherlock Holmes cosplay, or just a really nice coat.

cathrin.title: Cathrin Corset
cathrin.description: Cathrin is an underbust corset or waist trainer.

florent.title: Florent Flat Cap
florent.description: Florent is a flat cap, a rounded cap with a small stiff brim in front.

huey.title: Huey Hoodie
huey.description: Huey is a zip-up hoodie with optional front pockets.

hugo.title: Hugo Hoodie
hugo.description: Hugo is a hooded jumper with raglan sleeves.

jaeger.title: Jaeger Jacket
jaeger.description: Jeager is a sport coat style jacket with two buttons and patch pockets.

simon.title: Simon Shirt
simon.description: Simon is a highly adaptable shirt pattern for men.

theo.title: Theo trousers
theo.description: Theo is Theodore with a more slim cut.

theodore.title: Theodore trousers
theodore.description: Theodore are classic trousers by the (Aldrich) book.

trayvon.title: Trayvon Tie
trayvon.description: Trayvon is a tie that cuts no corners for a professional result.

wahid.title: Wahid Waistcoat
wahid.description: Wahid is a classic fitted waistcoat.

acrossBackFactor.title: Across back factor
acrossBackFactor.description: Controls your across back width as a factor of your shoulder to shoulder measurement.

adjustmentRibbon.title: Adjustment Ribbon
adjustmentRibbon.description: Add a ribbon to make the tie adjustable.

armholeDepthFactor.title: Armhole depth factor
armholeDepthFactor.description: Controls the depth of the armhole. Higher values make a deeper armhole.

armholeDrop.title: Armhole drop
armholeDrop.description: Lower the armhole by this amount. Negative values will raise it.

backDrop.title: Back drop
backDrop.description: How much the back panels lower from your hips towards your center back. Negative values will raise the back.

backInset.title: Back inset
backInset.description: Amount the back armhole is cut deeper into the back panel.

backOpening.title: Back opening
backOpening.description: Opening at the center back closure.

description._default: The amount by which to raise the back.
description.bruce: Percentage by which the waist will be raised at the back.
description.cathrin: How much the back panels rise from your arms to your center back.

backScyeDart.title: Back scye dart
backScyeDart.description: The amount to take out in a dart at the back of the armhole.

backVent.title: Back vent
backVent.description: Do you want a central back vent, or none at all?

backVentLength.title: Back vent length
backVentLength.description: Controls the length of the back vent. Lower numbers result in a shorter vent.

backlineBend.title: Back armhole shape
backlineBend.description: Determines the shape/bend of the back of the armholes.

barrelcuffNarrowButton.title: Cuff narrow button
barrelcuffNarrowButton.description: Whether to include a button to tie the cuffs more narrow. This option is only relevant for barrel cuffs.

bicepsEase.title: Biceps ease
bicepsEase.description: The amount of ease at your upper arm. Note that while we try to respect this, fitting the sleeve to the armhole takes precedence over respecting the exact amount of ease.

bowLength.title: Bow length
bowLength.description: The length of the wings of the bow tie.

bulge.title: Bulge
bulge.description: Increase angle to create more room in the front pouch.

buttonfreeLength.title: Button free length
buttonfreeLength.description: How much of the bottom of the front closure to keep button-free.

buttonholePlacketFoldWidth.title: Buttonhole placket fold width
buttonholePlacketFoldWidth.description: Width of the buttonhole placket fold.

buttons.title: Number of buttons
buttons.description: The number of buttons on the front closure.

centerBackDart.title: Center back dart
centerBackDart.description: The amount to take out in a dart at the top of the center back.

centerFrontHemDrop.title: Center front hem drop
centerFrontHemDrop.description: The hem at the front is lowered by this ratio of your neck to hips vertical measurements.

chestEase.title: Chest ease
chestEase.description: The amount of ease at your chest.

chestPocketAngle.title: Chest pocket angle
chestPocketAngle.description: The angle of the chest pocket.

chestPocketPlacement.title: Chest pocket placement
chestPocketPlacement.description: Location of the chest pocket as a proportion a quarter of your chest circumference. Higher numbers move it more to the side.

chestPocketWeltSize.title: Chest pocket welt height
chestPocketWeltSize.description: The height of the chest pocket welt.

chestPocketWidth.title: Chest pocket width
chestPocketWidth.description: The width of the chest pocket, as a factor of your chest circumference.

chestShaping.title: Chest shaping
chestShaping.description: The vertical amount to slash & spread the upper front panel to shape the chest, as a factor of your chest circumference.

collarAngle.title: Collar angle
collarAngle.description: The angle of the collar tips.

collarEase.title: Collar ease
collarEase.description: The amount of ease around your neck.

collarFlare.title: Collar flare
collarFlare.description: The flare of the collar tips.

collarGap.title: Collar gap
collarGap.description: The gap between the the two collar ends.

collarHeight.title: Collar height
collarHeight.description: This is the collar height at the back of the neck and can never be less than twice the roll line collar height.

collarNotchReturn.title: Collar notch return
collarNotchReturn.description: Controls the length of the upper notch side. 100% = same as notch depth.

collarRoll.title: Collar roll
collarRoll.description: The amount by which the top collar is larger than the undercollar.

collarStandBend.title: Collar stand bend
collarStandBend.description: The bend of the collar stand.

collarStandCurve.title: Collar stand curve
collarStandCurve.description: The curve of the collar stand.

cuffButtonRows.title: Cuff button rows
cuffButtonRows.description: Whether to draft a single or double row of cuff buttons. This option is only relevant for barrel cuffs.

cuffDrape.title: Cuff drape
cuffDrape.description: The amount by which the sleeve is wider than the cuff where the are joined.

cuffEase.title: Cuff ease
cuffEase.description: The amount of ease at your wrist.

elasticWidth.title: Elastic width
elasticWidth.description: Width of the elastic band you intend to use.

endStyle.title: End style
endStyle.description: The style of the end of the tie.

extraTopButton.title: Extra top button
extraTopButton.description: Whether or not to include an extra top button on the front closure.

frontCutawayAngle.title: Front opening bottom cutaway angle
frontCutawayAngle.description: How much do you want the front to open up below the lower button.

frontCutawayStart.title: Front opening bottom cutaway start
frontCutawayStart.description: How much do you want the front to open up below the lower button.

frontDartPlacement.title: Front dart placement
frontDartPlacement.description: Location of the front dart as a proportion of your chest circumference. Higher numbers move it more to the side.

description._default: The amount the front neckline is lowered. Negative values raise the neckline.
description.cathrin: How much the front panels lower from your hips towards your center front.

frontInset.title: Front inset
frontInset.description: Amount the front armhole is cut deeper into the front panel.

frontPocketDepth.title: Front pocket depth
frontPocketDepth.description: The depth of the front pockets, as a factor of the space between your waist and hem.

frontPocketHeight.title: Front pocket height
frontPocketHeight.description: The height where the front pocket starts, as a factor of your natural waist to hip measurement.

frontPocketPlacement.title: Front pocket placement
frontPocketPlacement.description: Location of the front pockets as a proportion of your chest circumference. Higher numbers move it more to the side.

frontPocketWidth.title: Front pocket width
frontPocketWidth.description: The width of the front pocket, as a factor of your chest circumference.

frontRise.title: Front rise
frontRise.description: Rise of the front panels at center front, between your breasts. Negative values will lower them.

frontScyeDart.title: Front scye dart
frontScyeDart.description: The amount to take out in a dart at the front of the armhole.

frontStyle.title: Neckline style
frontStyle.description: Whether you want a rounded or classic necline.

headEase.title: Head ease
headEase.description: The amount of ease to fit the cap on your head.

hemCurve.title: Hem curve
hemCurve.description: The height of the curve on a curved hem.

hemRadius.title: Hem radius
hemRadius.description: Radius of the rounded hem. Not relevant if you chose a classic hem.

description._default: Whether you want a rounded or classic hem.
description.simon: The style of the shirt hem.

hipFlare.title: Hip flare
hipFlare.description: The amount to widen the shirt below the waist.

hipRise.title: Hip rise
hipRise.description: How much the side panels rise on your hips.

hipsEase.title: Hips ease
hipsEase.description: The amount of ease at your hips.

hipsReductionRatioBack.title: Hips reduction: back ratio
hipsReductionRatioBack.description: Proportion of the hips to be reduced in back panel shaping. Will also impact side panel shaping.

knotWidth.title: Knot width
knotWidth.description: The width of the tie at the knot/middle.

lapelStart.title: Lapel break point
lapelStart.description: Location of the lapel break point (where the front opening starts). Lower values are closer to the waistline, higher values closer to the chestline.

legBonus.title: Leg length bonus
legBonus.description: Extra length to add to the legs.

legStretch.title: Leg stretch
legStretch.description: For best results, you want to fit your legs a but more snugly — say no to gaping.

lengthBonus.title: Length bonus
lengthBonus.description: The amount to lengthen the garment. A negative value will shorten it.

neckInset.title: Neck inset
neckInset.description: Distance from the neck to the waistcoat neckline at the shoulder seam.

neckReduction.title: Center back neck dart
neckReduction.description: Neck shaping at center back as percent of chest circumference.

necklineBend.title: Neckline shape
necklineBend.description: Determines the shape/bend of the neckline at the front.

necklineDrop.title: Neckline drop
necklineDrop.description: The amount the neck is cutout at the front.

panels.title: Number of panels
panels.description: The number of panels to draft. More panels are better to fit a curvier model.

pouch.title: Front pouch
pouch.description: Would you like a pouch/pocket on your hoodie?

princessSeamSmoothFactor.title: Princess seam smooth factor
princessSeamSmoothFactor.description: Controls how sharply the princess seam will correct once it's passed the fullness of your breasts. A high factor will smooth the curve, resulting in a less fitted coat that's easier to sew. A low factor will sharpen the curve, resulting in a harder to sew seam, and a more fitted coat.

ribbing.title: Ribbing
ribbing.description: Do you want to include ribbing at the arms and hem, or will you apply a classic hem?

ribbingHeight.title: Ribbing height
ribbingHeight.description: The height of the ribbing band at the hem and wrists.

ribbingStretchFactor.title: Ribbing stretch factor
ribbingStretchFactor.description: Determines the negative ease for the ribbing.

ribbingWidth.title: Ribbing width
ribbingWidth.description: The width of the ribbing you want to use.

rise.title: Rise
rise.description: Amount to raise the waist. A negative value will lower it.

rollLineCollarHeight.title: Roll line collar height
rollLineCollarHeight.description: The amount by which the roll line hugs the neck.

seatEase.title: Seat ease
seatEase.description: The amount of ease at your butt.

shoulderEase.title: Shoulder ease
shoulderEase.description: The amount of ease at your shoulder. This increases the shoulder to shoulder distance to accomodate what you're wearing under your coat.

shoulderInset.title: Shoulder inset
shoulderInset.description: Distance from the shoulder point to the waistcoat armhole at the shoulder seam.

shoulderSlopeReduction.title: Shoulder slope reduction
shoulderSlopeReduction.description: The amount by which the shoulder slope is reduced to allow for shoulder padding.

shoulderStrapPlacement.title: Shoulderstrap placement
shoulderStrapPlacement.description: Determines whether the shoulder strap is placed closer to the neck (lower numbers) or the shoulder (higher numbers).

shoulderStrapWidth.title: Shoulderstrap width
shoulderStrapWidth.description: The width of the shoulder straps.

sideFrontPlacement.title: Front side boundary placement
sideFrontPlacement.description: Location of the front/side boundary as a proportion of your chest circumference. Higher numbers make a wider side panel.

sleeveBend.title: Sleeve bend
sleeveBend.description: How much do you want the sleeve to be bent at the elbow.

sleeveLengthBonus.title: Sleeve length bonus
sleeveLengthBonus.description: The amount to lengthen the sleeve. A negative value will shorten it.

sleevePlacketLength.title: Sleeve placket length
sleevePlacketLength.description: The length of the sleeve placket.

sleevePlacketWidth.title: Sleeve placket width
sleevePlacketWidth.description: The width of the sleeve placket.

sleevecapEase.title: Sleevecap ease
sleevecapEase.description: The amount by which the sleevecap seam is longer than the armhole seam.

sleevecapHeightFactor.title: Sleevecap height factor
sleevecapHeightFactor.description: Controls the height of the sleevecap. A higher value results in a higher and more narrow sleevecap.

splitYoke.title: Split yoke
splitYoke.description: Whether to draft a split or regular yoke.

description._default: The width of the wings of the bow tie at the tip.
description.trayvon: The width of the tie at the tip.

waistEase.title: Waist ease
waistEase.description: The amount of ease at your (natural) waist.

waistReduction.title: Waist reduction
waistReduction.description: The amount by which you want the corset to pinch your waist.

waistReductionRatioBack.title: Waist reduction: back ratio
waistReductionRatioBack.description: Proportion of the waist to be reduced in back panel shaping. Will also impact side panel shaping.

waistReductionRatioFront.title: Waist reduction: front ratio
waistReductionRatioFront.description: Proportion of the waist to be reduced in the front dart. Will also impact side panel shaping.

yokeDart.title: Yoke dart
yokeDart.description: Whether to include a dart at the sides of the yoke to fit a rounder back.
